alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iroquois, southern Newton, Benton and southern Jasper Counties through 600 PM CDT/700 PM EDT/... At 451 PM CDT/551 PM EDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hoopeston, or 12 miles south of Milford, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rensselaer, Fowler, Kentland, Milford, Otterbein, Remington, Oxford, Goodland, Brook, Boswell, Earl Park, Stockland, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Wellington, Ambia, Dunnington, Wadena, Swanington and Baileys Corner. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 215. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
